data.title: Miles Davis 1980s Reissues (Colored 5xLP Bundle)
data.meta_description: Sony Legacy Recordings and Get On Down are proud to present Miles Davis's 1980s Columbia albums reissued in limited edition colored vinyl variants with Japanese stylized inserts and deluxe OBI strips  All four albums have been remastered from the original analog tapes Save $30 when you order all four albums in this dis
data.text:
Sony Legacy Recordings and Get On Down are proud to present Miles Davis's 1980s Columbia albums reissued in limited edition colored vinyl variants with Japanese stylized inserts and deluxe OBI strips

All four albums have been remastered from the original analog tapes

Save $30 when you order all four albums in this discounted bundle

The Man With The Horn (1981) pressed on crystal clear vinyl

We Want Miles (1982) pressed on double opaque yellow vinyl

Decoy (1984) pressed on crystal clear vinyl

You’re Under Arrest (1985) pressed on crystal clear vinyl

Each album is also available for individual purchase .
